body_html:
@aaroey
total 8510701568
free 7817658368
when I set per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.5, tensorflow use 4239MB,not the actual 81160.5=4058.
when I set per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.4 , tensorflow use 3427MB,not the actual 81160.4=3246.

I found that tensorflow use extra 180MB memory。and i don‘t know the reason

body:
@aaroey 
total 8510701568
free 7817658368
when I set per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.5, tensorflow use 4239MB,not the actual 8116*0.5=4058.
when I set per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.4 , tensorflow use 3427MB,not the actual 8116*0.4=3246.

I found that tensorflow use extra 180MB memory。and i don‘t know the reason
